content: http://www.heraldextra.com/content/view/302063/36/ quote: Thursday, 05 March 2009 Russian scholar says U.S. will collapse next year Mike Eckel - The Associated Press MOSCOW -- If you're inclined to believe Igor Panarin, and the Kremlin wouldn't mind if you did, then President Barack Obama will order martial law this year, the U.S. will split into six rump-states before 2011, and Russia and China will become the backbones of a new world order. Panarin might be easy to ignore but for the fact that he is a dean at the Foreign Ministry's school for future diplomats and a regular on Russia's state-guided TV channels. And his predictions fit into the anti-American story line of the Kremlin leadership. "There is a high probability that the collapse of the United States will occur by 2010," Panarin told dozens of students, professors and diplomats Tuesday at the Diplomatic Academy -- a lecture the ministry pointedly invited The Associated Press and other foreign media to attend. Obviously, he's no friend to America... But when he says, being the mouth piece of Putin, that a Union between Russia and China will emerge as the leader of a "New World Order"....! That bears wary walking! Wandering and Wondering
quote: Thursday, 05 March 2009 Russian scholar says U.S. will collapse next year Mike Eckel - The Associated Press MOSCOW -- If you're inclined to believe Igor Panarin, and the Kremlin wouldn't mind if you did, then President Barack Obama will order martial law this year, the U.S. will split into six rump-states before 2011, and Russia and China will become the backbones of a new world order. Panarin might be easy to ignore but for the fact that he is a dean at the Foreign Ministry's school for future diplomats and a regular on Russia's state-guided TV channels. And his predictions fit into the anti-American story line of the Kremlin leadership. "There is a high probability that the collapse of the United States will occur by 2010," Panarin told dozens of students, professors and diplomats Tuesday at the Diplomatic Academy -- a lecture the ministry pointedly invited The Associated Press and other foreign media to attend.

content: In China and Russia the government officials and business leaders who do things that are detrimental to the country are punished appropriately, no matter how rich or highly placed they are. Consider Russia’s Khordokofsky and Gazprom, or how the officials involved in the Chinese milk scandal will be punished. Here in America, if you’re rich enough or know the right people, you get to be on Lifestyles of the Rich and Famous. Case in point, Bernie Madoff, who’s still sitting at home, and who’s been shipping hundreds of millions worth of “heirloom jewelry” out to relatives before the feds get ahold of it.

content: Like China and Russia is having it so good? Give him credit since their experience with Soviet Union falling on their butts. It was the US staying at arms length instead of conspiring their complete downfall. Russia's rise to power also noted to be aided by western business expertise and dollars. China relied on American for $338 billion trade last year. Doubt Russia with a GDP under one trillion can make up the difference. I'm not saying Chinas survival is based on ours but the vacumn left by the US going belly up would be very hard to fill by any one or group. We're all falling on our collective arse from greed. Like I said the only advantage they have is experience.

content: quote: Originally posted by greywolfghost: http://www.heraldextra.com/content/view/302063/36/ quote: Thursday, 05 March 2009 Russian scholar says U.S. will collapse next year Mike Eckel - The Associated Press MOSCOW -- If you're inclined to believe Igor Panarin, and the Kremlin wouldn't mind if you did, then President Barack Obama will order martial law this year, the U.S. will split into six rump-states before 2011, and Russia and China will become the backbones of a new world order. Panarin might be easy to ignore but for the fact that he is a dean at the Foreign Ministry's school for future diplomats and a regular on Russia's state-guided TV channels. And his predictions fit into the anti-American story line of the Kremlin leadership. "There is a high probability that the collapse of the United States will occur by 2010," Panarin told dozens of students, professors and diplomats Tuesday at the Diplomatic Academy -- a lecture the ministry pointedly invited The Associated Press and other foreign media to attend. Obviously, he's no friend to America... But when he says, being the mouth piece of Putin, that a Union between Russia and China will emerge as the leader of a "New World Order"....! That bears wary walking! China hates Russia, no worries!
quote: Originally posted by greywolfghost: http://www.heraldextra.com/content/view/302063/36/ quote: Thursday, 05 March 2009 Russian scholar says U.S. will collapse next year Mike Eckel - The Associated Press MOSCOW -- If you're inclined to believe Igor Panarin, and the Kremlin wouldn't mind if you did, then President Barack Obama will order martial law this year, the U.S. will split into six rump-states before 2011, and Russia and China will become the backbones of a new world order. That bears wary walking!
reply: China hates Russia, no worries!

China relied on American for $338 billion trade last year. Doubt Russia with a GDP under one trillion can make up the difference. I'm not saying Chinas survival is based on ours but the vacumn left by the US going belly up would be very hard to fill by any one or group. We're all falling on our collective arse from greed. Like I said the only advantage they have is experience.

content: quote: Originally posted by EAG154: quote: Originally posted by greywolfghost: http://www.heraldextra.com/content/view/302063/36/ quote: Thursday, 05 March 2009 Russian scholar says U.S. will collapse next year Mike Eckel - The Associated Press MOSCOW -- If you're inclined to believe Igor Panarin, and the Kremlin wouldn't mind if you did, then President Barack Obama will order martial law this year, the U.S. will split into six rump-states before 2011, and Russia and China will become the backbones of a new world order. Panarin might be easy to ignore but for the fact that he is a dean at the Foreign Ministry's school for future diplomats and a regular on Russia's state-guided TV channels. And his predictions fit into the anti-American story line of the Kremlin leadership. "There is a high probability that the collapse of the United States will occur by 2010," Panarin told dozens of students, professors and diplomats Tuesday at the Diplomatic Academy -- a lecture the ministry pointedly invited The Associated Press and other foreign media to attend. Obviously, he's no friend to America... But when he says, being the mouth piece of Putin, that a Union between Russia and China will emerge as the leader of a "New World Order"....! That bears wary walking! China hates Russia, no worries! WRONG! They are cutting a deal as we speak: Siberian oil for China in return for less tension on the Chinese/Russian frontier, and cooperation against the West and America. If that works, both will back North Korea, Iran, Venezuela and Sudan. That will surround us and spread us so thin that we may have to throw in the towel - - Wandering and Wondering

Panarin might be easy to ignore but for the fact that he is a dean at the Foreign Ministry's school for future diplomats and a regular on Russia's state-guided TV channels.
